item.description: Tracing the evolution of malware analysis offers us a retrospective on the strategies in cybersecurity offense and defense.

item.title: Why Cybersecurity
item.author: debidong
item.description: According to my observation, the general cost of cybersecurity projects in universities is higher than that of pure computer science... But why is that?
